name: Beyond (itch) (Rulf Foxton)
description:
Game Description

Beyond is a combination of 2D Platforming and Point and Click Adventure game. I experimented to combine 2 different types of gameplay in this game and that's what I am offering from this game.

Story Description

Wakes up in a strange and bizarre world where life and death can't be defined, 'Beyond' tells a story about a young boy named Sam Watson who recently died and he is now wandering around an unknown world in a spirit form. He doesn't know about what happened, how he got here and how he died and this is a story of Sam discovering about himself in this odd world.

Gameplay Description

There are 2 types of gameplay in this game. First one, there's a 2D side-scrolling type of gameplay where you play as Sam, walking around the area while avoiding the spirits around. The second type of gameplay is in a first person point of view and it is a point and click adventure where you can interact with objects and solve puzzles to make progress.

The game is made with Unity2D

Good luck and hope you enjoy the game :)
